name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
description: Foundational concepts including structure, bonding, and hybridization in organic molecules.

lessons.name: Atomic Structure and Bonding
lessons.description: Understanding electron configuration and covalent bonding in organic compounds.

lessons.name: Functional Groups Overview
lessons.description: Identification and properties of common functional groups in organic chemistry.

lessons.name: Hybridization and Molecular Shapes
lessons.description: Introduction to sp3, sp2, and sp hybridization and molecular geometry.

name: Stereochemistry and Isomerism
description: Explore structural isomerism, stereoisomerism, and chirality in organic compounds.

lessons.name: Constitutional Isomers
lessons.description: Different structures with the same molecular formula.

lessons.name: Stereoisomers and Chirality
lessons.description: Understanding mirror images, enantiomers, and diastereomers.

lessons.name: R/S Configuration
lessons.description: Assigning absolute configuration to chiral centers.

name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
description: Basic concepts of periodic properties, atomic structure, and ionic bonding.

lessons.name: Periodic Table and Trends
lessons.description: Exploring periodic trends such as electronegativity and atomic size.

lessons.name: Ionic vs Covalent Bonding
lessons.description: Comparison of ionic and covalent bonding types in inorganic compounds.

lessons.name: Acids and Bases
lessons.description: Understanding Brønsted-Lowry and Lewis acids and bases.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Structure, bonding theories, and nomenclature of coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Definition, structure, and uses of coordination complexes.

lessons.name: Ligands and Nomenclature
lessons.description: Naming coordination compounds and identifying ligand types.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Exploring d-orbital splitting and color in transition metal complexes.

name: Physical Chemistry Foundations
description: Fundamentals of thermodynamics, kinetics, and chemical equilibrium.

lessons.name: Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Laws of thermodynamics and applications in chemical systems.

lessons.name: Chemical Kinetics
lessons.description: Reaction rates, rate laws, and activation energy.

lessons.name: Equilibrium and Le Chatelier's Principle
lessons.description: Dynamic equilibrium in chemical reactions.

name: Quantum Chemistry and Spectroscopy
description: Quantum mechanical model of atoms and spectroscopic techniques.

lessons.name: Quantum Mechanics Basics
lessons.description: Wave functions, orbitals, and electron behavior.

lessons.name: Atomic and Molecular Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Techniques such as IR, UV-Vis, and NMR.

lessons.name: Molecular Orbitals
lessons.description: Bonding and antibonding orbitals in molecular systems.

name: Elvish and Dwarvish Linguistics
description: Linguistic analysis of Sindarin, Quenya, and Khuzdul.

lessons.name: Sindarin Syntax
lessons.description: Grammar and sentence structure in the Sindarin language.

lessons.name: Quenya Phonology
lessons.description: Sound patterns and pronunciation in Quenya.

lessons.name: Dwarvish Lexicon
lessons.description: Vocabulary and roots in the Khuzdul language.

name: Diplomacy in Middle-earth
description: Political dynamics and alliances among Elves, Men, and other races.

lessons.name: Council of Elrond
lessons.description: Analysis of decision-making during major events.

lessons.name: Treaties and Conflicts
lessons.description: Key alliances and conflicts in Middle-earth history.

lessons.name: Wizards and Their Influence
lessons.description: Role of Istari in shaping diplomatic outcomes.
